stability_indices.name: obsolete
stability_indices.description: This feature is no longer supported. Do not use it.

stability_indices.name: deprecated
stability_indices.description: Breaking changes are planned for this feature, or it will be removed in future versions. It is no longer in development, and should not be relied upon.

stability_indices.name: experimental
stability_indices.description: This feature is in development, but is unsupported or subject to change. It could be removed in future versions.

stability_indices.name: stable
stability_indices.description: This feature has been tested and proven satisfactory. It is in development, but no breaking changes will be made unless absolutely necessary.

stability_indices.name: locked
stability_indices.description: Only patches will be made to this feature. It is no longer in development. It may be heavily relied upon and will not be removed in future versions.

properties.name: display
properties.summary: Sets the type of box rendered.

properties.name: position
properties.summary: Sets the position of box rendered.

properties.name: left
properties.summary: Specifies how far to position an element from the left.

properties.name: right
properties.summary: Specifies how far to position an element from the right.

properties.name: top
properties.summary: Specifies how far to position an element from the top.

properties.name: bottom
properties.summary: Specifies how far to position an element from the bottom.

properties.name: float
properties.summary: Floats the box in content.

properties.name: clear
properties.summary: Specifies positioning next to floating elements.

properties.name: z-index
properties.summary: Defines the z-order of an element and descendants. Z-order is defined as the order of elements in the direction perpendicular to the screen.

properties.name: vertical-align
properties.summary: Vertically aligns text in an inline or table-cell box.

properties.name: flex-direction
properties.summary: Specifies how flex items are placed in the flex container.

properties.name: flex-wrap
properties.summary: Determines whether boxes wrap to the next row or column.

properties.name: justify-content
properties.summary: Defines how the browser distributes space between and around flex items along the main-axis of their container.

properties.name: align-content
properties.summary: Aligns a flex containerâ€™s lines when there is empty space in the cross-axis.

properties.name: align-items
properties.summary: Defines default behavior for aligining flex items along cross-axis.

properties.name: align-self
properties.summary: Overrides behavior of `align-items` for aligining one specific flex item along cross-axis.

properties.name: order
properties.summary: Specifies the order used to lay out flex items.

properties.name: flex
properties.summary: Shorthand for setting the flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis properties of an element.

properties.name: box-sizing
properties.summary: Alters the CSS box model used to calculate width and height.

properties.name: width
properties.summary: Sets the width of an element.

properties.name: margin
properties.summary: Sets the margin space on an element.

properties.name: padding
properties.summary: Sets the padding space on an element.

properties.name: font-style
properties.summary: Sets italics or oblique on the typeface.

properties.name: font-variant
properties.summary: Sets small capitals on the typeface.

properties.name: font-weight
properties.summary: Sets weight on the typeface.

properties.name: font-size
properties.summary: Sets the font size.

properties.name: font-family
properties.summary: Sets the typeface.

properties.name: line-height
properties.summary: Sets the minimum height of line boxes.

properties.name: letter-spacing
properties.summary: Sets the spacing between characters in text.

properties.name: word-spacing
properties.summary: Sets the spacing between tags and words in text.

properties.name: text-align
properties.summary: Horizontally aligns text in a block.

properties.name: text-indent
properties.summary: Leaves empty space before lines of text in a block.

properties.name: white-space
properties.summary: Determines how white space in source code is rendered.

properties.name: overflow-wrap
properties.summary: Specifies whether words can be broken and wrapped to prevent overflow.

values.name: initial
values.use: word-wrap: normal;     overflow-wrap: normal; word-wrap: initial; overflow-wrap: initial;

properties.name: column-count
properties.summary: Sets the number of columns of content.

properties.name: column-width
properties.summary: Suggests the optimal width for columns of content.

properties.name: page-break-before
properties.summary: Defines a page-break before an element.

properties.name: page-break-after
properties.summary: Defines a page-break after an element.

properties.name: border-style
properties.summary: Sets the line style of the border on a side of an element.

properties.name: border-color
properties.summary: Sets the color of the border on a side of an element.

properties.name: background-image
properties.summary: Sets the background image.

properties.name: background-position
properties.summary: Sets the position of the background image.

properties.name: background-size
properties.summary: Sets the size of the background image.

properties.name: background-repeat
properties.summary: Defines how the background image repeats.

properties.name: background-attachment
properties.summary: Sets how the background image is attached to the viewport.

properties.name: background-origin
properties.summary: Sets the position of the origin of the background image.

properties.name: background-clip
properties.summary: Sets whether the background image/color extends beneath the padding/border.

properties.name: background-color
properties.summary: Sets the background color.

properties.name: overflow
properties.summary: Defines how content outside the box is rendered.

properties.name: opacity
properties.summary: Sets the transparency of an element.

properties.name: visibility
properties.summary: Specifies whether an element is visible or hidden.

properties.name: box-shadow
properties.summary: Describes one or more shadow effects on the frame of an element.

properties.name: color
properties.summary: Sets the text color.

properties.name: text-transform
properties.summary: Capitalizes text.

properties.name: text-decoration
properties.summary: Sets a line decoration to text.

properties.name: text-shadow
properties.summary: Describes shadow effects on the text and text-decorations of an element.

properties.name: text-overflow
properties.summary: Defines how invisible overflowed text content, if any, is rendered.

properties.name: list-style-type
properties.summary: Specifies the appearance of list item markers.

properties.name: list-style-position
properties.summary: Sets the position of list item markers.

properties.name: list-style-image
properties.summary: Sets the image used as list item markers.
